name: Sweet and Spicy Asian Dipping Sauce
description: A fantastic dipping sauce for salad and spring rolls, or shrimp and chicken fingers. Also a zesty dressing for salads, Asian Hot and Sour Coleslaw, or a sauce for noodle dishes.
preparation: Whisk all ingredients together in a mixing bowl or shake in a jar with a tight fitting lid.
Store in a sealed container in the refrigerator for up to one week.
